tool_description: Collects and structures essential client information for legal case intake, including personal details, contact information, and case background.

client_name.description: Full legal name of the client

contact_phone.description: Primary phone number for client contact

contact_email.description: Primary email address for client contact

address.description: Full mailing address of the client

case_description.description: Brief description of the legal matter or case

error_messages: Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address in the format user@domain.com
Missing required information: All fields (client_name, contact_phone, contact_email, address, case_description) must be provided
Invalid phone format: Provide phone number in a valid format with area code
usage: Provide all required client contact and case information. The tool will structure and validate the information for use in subsequent intake processes.

client_id.description: Unique identifier generated for the client

structured_data.description: Formatted client information ready for case file creation

validation_status.description: Status of information validation (complete, incomplete, needs_review)
